decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The use hereby permitted shall be carried out for a limited period, being the period of one year from the date of this letter.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 716/SK/0001 & 716/LOC received 22/10/2013 therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The area indicated on the ground floor plan as 'room proposed to be used for taxi office' area shall not be used as waiting/leisure area for drivers, radio control operators.
description: Change of use of room in rear annexe from office to taxi office
